snippet: DOPPELT--Eleanor. On January 9, our beautiful, beloved mother passed. Ellie was predeceased by her adoring husband, Stanley. Cherished mother of Earl (Diane), Stuart (Roni) Jonathan (Carolyn) and Alison Kozek (Neil). Devoted grandmother of Brad, Kyle and Meredith Doppelt, Brian and Stephanie Doppelt, Jason, David and Jennifer Doppelt and Adam, Daniel and Brooke Kozek. Doting great-grandmother of Hunter, Miles and Leya. Loving sister of Alvin Lee. She will be missed by all. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DOPPELT--Eleanor. On January 9, our beautiful, beloved mother passed. Ellie was predeceased by her adoring husband, Stanley. Cherished mother of Earl (Diane), Stuart (Roni) Jonathan (Carolyn) and Alison Kozek (Neil). Devoted grandmother of Brad, Kyle and Meredith Doppelt, Brian and Stephanie Doppelt, Jason, David and Jennifer Doppelt and Adam, Daniel and Brooke Kozek. Doting great-grandmother of Hunter, Miles and Leya. Loving sister of Alvin Lee. She will be missed by all. 1/3
